summary: Motivated Full-Stack Web Developer with a strong software engineering background and keen interest in web development. Trained through programs, I’m now at 1337 School, part of the prestigious 42Network system. This program focuses on deepening knowledge in C, Shell scripting, advanced algorithms, systems programming, software architecture, and Web Development. Eager to apply my expertise and innovative approach to create impactful web development solutions.

projects.title: Minishell (C Programming)
description_points: Designed a a custom UNIX command-line interpreter, as part of the 42 Network curriculum.
Implemented core shell functionalities, including process execution, error handling, input/output redirection, pipes, and signal handling.
Addressed usability concerns and ensured robust performance.

projects.title: Hobby Hub (CRUD Web Application)
description_points: Developed an interactive platform for hobby enthusiasts using Ruby on Rails and JavaScript.
Built a clean, responsive front-end and a robust backend for CRUD operations.
Designed and integrated APIs for seamless user interactions.

education.details: Specialized in C & C++ programming, algorithms, Shell scripting, and systems programming.
